name: Kitten Connection
description:
This is a kitten game I made for the GMTK game jam.

I ran out of time to add: a save feature, sound and music, and dialogue for the kittens. And I ran out of time to make it not only for Windows.

However, I think it is still a cute game.

There are two mistakes I know of in the jam version:

  • The stars can be collected repeatedly. Collecting them a second time doesn't do anything though.
  • There are more keys than locked doors. No, the extra key isn't for a secret, sorry.

After the jam rating period is over, maybe I can add the stuff I didn't have time to add, and fix these small problems. I will also make a browser version at some point.

Instructions and Tips

The game has strange mechanics. Maybe you want to figure them out yourself. If not, here are some tips.

  • Make a Kitten Connection by touching kittens without landing on the ground. Something good will usually happen.
  • You can air-jump when touching Burgers and DarkGemstones.
  • Touching Burgers and DarkGemstones will increase Combo which increases jump height and movement speed. Combo is reset when you land on ground.
  • Pressing Up will let you jump.
  • Interact with Magic Mirrors and Doors by pressing Down. Also pressing Down will pick up certain items like Keys and other great items.
  • If you get in a bad situation, Escape will reset the screen.
  • Sometimes it's difficult to proceed and you might need to think about your approach in a different way.
